Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/84th
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after an earlier signal problems near Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after an earlier signal problems near Rosemont.

Shuttle buses are available in both directions from O'Hare to Jefferson park to provide connecting service.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near O'Hare
ShortDescription:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems at Rosemont.

Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems at Rosemont.

Shuttle buses are available in both directions from O'Hare to Jefferson park to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
